name: Food Truck Chef
description:
You were invited to a food truck festival, and as a food truck owner, you must be there in time, but there are always the better spots to be, and since you don`t wanna lose them, you gotta go faster than the others!

Includes:

  • Four different and long levels to test your handling.
  • Many different trucks to choose from.
  • Gasoline system to keep you engaged.
  • Different obstacles and pilots to beat.

developed with Unity 3D.
